title: 501B.34 CHARITABLE TRUSTS; SUPERVISION BY ATTORNEY GENERAL.
text: Sections 501B.33 to 501B.45 apply to trustees holding property for charitable purposes. In connection with the supervision, administration, and enforcement of charitable trusts, the attorney general has the rights, duties, and powers in sections 501B.33 to 501B.45, and common law and statutory rights, duties, and powers.
